oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Memphis Retail Credit Association's 1934 banquet
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: businesses; department stores; Peabody Hotel; photography; portraits;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph from 1934 Memphis Retail Credit Associations Banquet. June 21st 1934 at the Peabody Hotel. Note on back reads: "1st R. Sam Bauman, - ,H.G Orndorf, J Porter McClean, MB Sienerson, Joe Forlin. HC Stroope, Mo Crofton, -, -. 2nd R Stella Wallace, -, Etna Goodna, Cliff Walson, -, -, Joe Seceat, -, Tony Hamoon, -, -, Lena Covusauo."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Harry Gerstel Studio
